title: Aaron and Milan are friends and _______ of them go to the same school. They are classmates, too.
Nancy and Jenny are 27 years old and they are _______ bankers.
_______ the eleven footballers in the team were happy about the final score _______ of them were sad.

_______ of the five girls has short black hair. _______ of them have long brown hair.
